# In Windows

## Using Type-2 Hypervisor

- Download and Install Virtual Box
    - [Link](https://www.virtualbox.org/wiki/Downloads){target="_blank"}
- Download .iso file of any distribution
    - e.g. [Ubuntu](https://mirror.ajl.albony.in/ubuntu-releases/){target="_blank"}
- Install iso file in Virtual Box
    - Click on New
    - Select Iso and fill required data...
